website_summaries.verdict: An unbeatable pick when it comes to features and value: practical, comfortable, and attractive for a budget price.
pros: Sheets, pillow case, sham, and comforter are perfect for any weather
cons: The set has fewer pieces (5 total) than costlier models, but it still has a lot to offer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of buying this because I am big on reading reviews before purchasing items, and it seemed that all the reviews were from people who had been sent this bedding for free. I decided to go ahead and buy it, and I really love it! It's very pretty, the sheets are so soft and lightweight, and all pieces held up well in the washer and dryer. For $50 you can't beat this set. Very impressed! -KM
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Cobb

customer_reviews.title: Surely there is a catch...
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't belive the price on this whole package. Opened it up and felt the comforter...thought it was a little rough of a material until I found out it was a different much smoother and softer material on the inside. The fitted sheet fit perfectly over my twin XL mattress with a 3" memory foam topper in my semi truck. The sheet was great as well. Feels like a great quality set for a great low price.
customer_reviews.author: Roteck

customer_reviews.title: Won't recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Came nicely packaged. Took it out to wash and it had this stain already and a few other small ones. I put water and wiped it to see if it would come off and it won't. Im washing it at the moment and hopefully it comes off. Ill update the review once done. But for now, they should make sure product is presentable and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Cruiz Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Looks good on my guest bed. Bought the blue color. It is more of a lighter grey blue color than in the picture (which is what I hoped for) Awesome price. Sheets are a bit too satin for my taste if it were my bed though.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Comforter and sham A-OK; Burn the nasty sheets
customer_reviews.text: We bought this set for staging our house in Ohio when we sold it. For that use, this is perfect. The comforter and the shame are great. The problem her is that the sheets are simply nasty. Thin and they feel cheap, because they are. I can't ask my guests to sleep on sheets that I wouldn't want. So buy this for the comforter and the sham, burn the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. K. Haley

customer_reviews.title: ZERO STARS
customer_reviews.text: This set is gorgeous when you open the box. However, I washed it on delicate prior to putting on my bed and the whole comforter ripped open and all of the stuffing came out. I am very unhappy. I have never had a comforter do this, not even cheap ones from Walmart or Target. DO NOT PURCHASE THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley H.

customer_reviews.title: Great for staging a room
customer_reviews.text: We needed something to stage our master bedroom when we listed our old house for sale. This bed in a bag worked great. The comforter and the pillow shams get used in a our guest room, but the sheets and pillow cases were made of a diaphanous polyester that felt like imitation satin sheets in a Motel 3. I wouldn't want to sleep on, and wouldn't want to sleep on if I were a guest in a home. Loved the gray blue hue of the comforter and pillow shams. Are they durable? Yes. You can't kill plastic like that polyester. Are they light weight? Too much so. Are they Giftable? Only if you hate the bride.
customer_reviews.author: S. J. K. Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great price and product
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have high hopes with this bed set. It exceeded everything. It's the most comfy and beautiful set ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Sheets are really thin(low quality) As soon as I was putting the fitted sheet the elastic broke, can you guys believe that 😖 Came in a tiny box all squeezed up I thought I was only getting sheets no comforter. That's how thin these sheets are. Even the box was poor quality box. This product came from China. For 30 dollars maybe it would be worth but 50? I don't think so.
customer_reviews.author: she79col

customer_reviews.title: PERFECTION IN A BAG SUPER COMFY, DEEP SHEETS
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this item I really didn’t have my expectations too high. I figured I’d get it and it would be one of those sets where the sheet wasn’t deep enough and stuff like that but WOW! I am shocked. These are deep fitting amazing sheets. I can’t believe how soft and cozy these sheets are especially at the low price I paid! And the comforter....IT IS OUTSTANDING! Sooooooo soft!!!!!!!!! I don’t have a single complaint. This is truly amazing quality and comfort even better than the sets I’ve paid 100.00+ for!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MrsK

customer_reviews.title: nice but...
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, classic looking, easy care set. Decent quality. The only problem I had is when I took it out of the package there looked like some color changes on the comforter, I didn't think twice about it, figured it was the lighting (it was evening )and I threw it in the wash. The following morning while putting it on my bed I noticed they were all over :/. I didn't want to go through the hassle of returning it so my advice to you is to inspect it closely before washing it and getting rid of the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: C. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: We love this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bed set. Very comfortable, very eye appealing, very functional, and very affordable. Everything about it, fit well into our bedroom design and needs. No negative feedback at this time. We are extremely happy with this purchase. I do wish it came in more colors, We would buy a few more.
customer_reviews.author: savvyshoppergirl

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to buy these sheets because I needed a new set, mine were getting old. I really like this set for 3 reasons, the price, they are comfortable, and cute. Th price of $38.99 is really great, because I looked for a 5 piece set at some stores and they were asking $60 or more, so you really can't go wrong for $38.99. I was pleasantly surprised at how soft the sheets and comforter were, they feel like I'm sleeping on clouds because they are that soft. 5 of 5 stars! I recommend this set to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Soft and cool feeling. The comforter is not thin, but not too thick. Love the color, great for spring/summer. Fit my queen mattress and fluffy pillows just right :). Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy and Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: It’s currently 1:57am on a Tuesday morning. I’m awake because, after tossing and turning in these sheets for the last few hours, I’ve given up and just changed-out all the sheets again. These are the most scratchy, clingy, and uncomfortable sheets that I’ve ever experienced. For someone who normally swears by the quality and value of the AmazonBasics brand, this is extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: T0MWH0

customer_reviews.title: Buy with confidence!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I can't get over how soft these sheets and comforter are! I bought them for my 4 year old's new Big Boy Bed, but these sheets are softer than my own high thread count sets, even after several washings. I purchased a set for a full-size bed, but they are huge on it. They would fit even if you have a thicker/deeper mattress.
customer_reviews.author: MzkThpy1

customer_reviews.title: Stained and bunched threads
customer_reviews.text: I immediately pulled out the sheets and washed them. They felt okay, kinda crappy but decently silky kinda. And then I saw that the comforter had uneven coloring and a few stains. Hoping it would come out in the wash. I threw it in. Sadly it did not come out and when I took it out of the dryer much of the threading had bunching. Very poor quality; not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: COMPLETE DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: Well the product is nice. What I received of it. Didnt get the shams. After a much anticipated long stay for my son coming home from the hospital. So excited to have a nice fresh bed for him to relax in. Did not arrive complete. By the time I took it out of the too small bag it was shoved in and realized the shams were missing. It was too late. Homecoming ruined. Never again will I recommend or purchase an Amazon basic. I guess they call it basic because it is incomplete. No I am not returning. I needed for a certain time frame. Not to wait weeks for a replacement and more aggrivation.
customer_reviews.author: LOVETOSHOP

customer_reviews.title: Don't get for full size bed
customer_reviews.text: Unlike me to write a bad review for an Amazon product, but the reviews on this are totally ambiguous as to what size sheets you get. And judging by the pictures people posted, I don't even know if we're reviewing the same specific item or just Amazon bedding in general. The sheets I got for my mom's full-size bed are way too big; they are definitely queen sheets. My mom had already washed them before she realized that, so they're not in "new and unused" condition anymore, which means I can't return them. As for quality, I'd say they're comparable to similar bedding you can buy at a retail store, but there you'll know exactly what you're getting :-)
customer_reviews.author: Broomfield_CO

customer_reviews.title: " It felt pretty cheap out of the bag
customer_reviews.text: It looks a little greener than the photos, but definitely still in the realm of "teal." It felt pretty cheap out of the bag, but it softened a lot in the wash. It's obviously not a luxury product, but it's comfortable, and the quality is great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Great set. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the AmazonBasics 7-Piece Light-Weight Microfiber Bed-In-A-Bag Comforter Bedding Set - Queen, Purple Floral. I receive the comforter and two shams. I did not receive the sheet set or the pillowcases that I paid for and are suppose to be included in the set. I did contact Amazon and they said they will send the missing items. My rating will be modified upon receipt of the sheets and pillowcase. Update: Amazon did send a replacement and all items arrived. Everything washed well and the set looks great! I am happy with the set and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlea

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable!  Poor Quality!  Terrible Off-Gassing of VOCs
customer_reviews.text: I received a product caked with mud. How does that happen Amazon?! When i received the replacement it had threads coming out and pulls everywhere but my family was arriving for two weeks and I had no time for another return process with amazon! I still have a comforter that has very visible pulls and a hole in the bottom. You get what you pay for. If you are looking for something durable, this is NOT for you.
customer_reviews.author: meaghan morris

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Nice bed in a bag set. Quality is as expected for this price range. The sheets are a typical 400 style count. Comforter has a good amount a fill for colder nights. I don’t think you can beat the price/ value on these sets. One thing to know is the twin fits great. Double will also fit a queen so the fitted sheet will be a little loose. Elastic sheet holders will take care of this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey B. Platt

customer_reviews.title: Incredible price for a good quality comforter and sheets set!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter and sheet set is the softest material I’ve ever slept under! The comforter is light weight. It’s cool over you when it’s warm out and cozy when it’s cold. I bought it for my guest room, my sister stayed over and loved the bedsheets and comforter. She went home and ordered the gray leaf set for her bed. Her husband was so impressed he told her to order another set for season change! The colors are exactly as shown. I can’t decide which set to order for my own bed. I also bought the dark purple with the white flower twin set for my MIL, Who resides in a assisted living home. She absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: K .White

customer_reviews.title: Queen Bed Bag
customer_reviews.text: I had already bought these sheets in another color for my guest bedroom and they were great so I decided to buy them for my bed. Since I live in South Texas I need light sheets for the summer and these work great for that. Dislike, fitted sheet in kinda too big and wants to come off and have to reposition every time I make my bed in the morning. Overall its perfect for what i need and I have already bought another set.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Do not dry comferter or you will be sorry :(...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed love the set absolutely beautiful and felt amazing but than i washed it...the material inside the comferter is ruined fells like it was set on fire or something its hard and matted together :(...it is a xmas present 4 my son so i am devised its xmas eve and ruinedish...sheets are great super soft and again beautiful but the comferter is another story...bottom line if u wash dont dry it or u will be sorry...im going to contact amazon and return...it would be 1 star except sheets and pillow cases are perfect and again its beautiful...
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S

customer_reviews.title: IT IS SHORT
customer_reviews.text: I ACTUALLY THOUGHT I WAS BUYING A QUILT. I WAS DISAPPOINTED TO FIND IT WAS A COMFORTER, BUT THAT BEING SAID I KEPT AND HAVE IT ON THE SPARE BEDROOM BED. VERY BRIGHT AND CHEERY, A MIGHT SHORT FOR THE QUEEN SIZE MATTRESS. ONE SIDE IS VERY SHORT IN ORDER FOR THE VISIBLE SIDE TO HANG LONG ENOUGH TO COVER SHEETS. SHEETS ARE GREAT AND VERY SOFT. I WOULD DOUBLE CHECK MY ORDER AGAIN TO BE SURE I AM GETTING WHAT I EXPECTED, BUT THIS WAS MY FAULT. I HAD PULLED UP QUILTS AND THIS CAME UP SO I THOUGHT IT WAS A QUILT. JUDY T
customer_reviews.author: JUDY T

customer_reviews.title: Bright colors that don't fade!
customer_reviews.text: The color is so vibrant, and it is perfect with the curtains I found on clearance at JCPenney! No matter how many times I wash these, the color never fades.
customer_reviews.author: c.cahill

customer_reviews.title: Huge sheets
customer_reviews.text: I love the shams and comforter, even the white pillow cases are not bad. However, the sheets are ginormous! They would fit a king or a really thick queen. I bought this for a full size bed and the sheets are just way too big. However if you are buying this for a queen size bed, the sheets will fit better but the comforter will not, it will be too short on the sides because the comforter fits our full so well. We have a box spring and a 6.5 in mattress. Wish this just came with the comforter and pillow cases/shams for 10/15 dollars less. The color is really great though.
customer_reviews.author: ELIZABETH TIPPING

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved the comforter set since taking it out of the bag. It is true to color and a great quality material. I would definitely recommend this product and will be purchasing several more for Christmas gifts. This is actually my 2nd Amazon Basics bed in a bag within the last 3 months and its amazing that when shopping via Amazon the comforter selection I love the most happens to be from Amazon Basics. Thanks for offering a quality product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Stasi Kaye

customer_reviews.title: Great gray bedding set!!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft set. Although the comforter isn't super thick, I always use a second blanket under the comforter. This should be perfect for me. Great product. Great price. It is indeed gray, not brown.
customer_reviews.author: Square_1

customer_reviews.title: Simply awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo soft! This bedding is buttery soft and great quality! Absolutly worth every penny! I especially love that the fitted sheet has the elastic all the way around instead of some manufacturers that just put it in the corners-- the fitted sheet is also made deep enough that it fits, tucks, and stays under my mattress even with a 3 inch topper on the mattress :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware Sizing!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set. Fabric looks and feels great, comforter is a great weight. Problem is, the sizes aren't specific to the bed. I ordered full/queen, but that just means queen. The bed is full size so the sheets don't work. Not really sure what the manufacturer is thinking having the sizing like that. Luckily my futon is a queen so I'll use the sheets on that, but I was disappointed that I had to go to Walmart to get sheets for the full bed.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Hollenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but with a Few Problems for Me
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty set, and you can reverse it from the low-key stripe to the plain color (I got the deep blue). I am a person who gets cold easily and this comforter is very warm. In fact, with the sheets and comforter set on, it becomes too warm for me. Also, the polyester sheets, though plenty large for my queen size bed, tend to stick to the comforter, so it isn't easy to slip back into bed after getting up for short times. Otherwise, I find it a very good deal indeed. I can even fit two smaller pillows into the two shams, which are included with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Wayfarer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, But Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The feel doesn’t say ‘quality’. Fine for a cheap starter set for a new bed, but will be replacing soon with something nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Neither Confirmed Nor Denied

customer_reviews.title: Don't event think about it
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of reviews on this product and it seems many people have low expectations on sheet quality for this many high ratings. These feel slick. The sheets are white and not the same pattern as the comforter. I also have two different shams! One is sewn with and edge and one isn't. I'll be trying to figure out what my return options are. I've trusted Amazon a lot and they completely let me down on these.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps its shape after multiple washes. Big plus for me.
customer_reviews.text: I can confirm I washed this and it came out the same no shrinking or wilting ,I,ve bough items before that shrunk on washing so am happy. It looks pretty masculine too which is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: ObiO

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits except the fitted sheet (ironic)
customer_reviews.text: I have a full bed and read that the fitted sheet would be just a bit too large for it since it's full/queen. The pillow cases fit my regular pillows fine, the comforter was larger than the bed space but that was okay with me, but the fitted sheet was much larger than expected even when I pulled the edges as far under the side of the bed as I could. It was fine the first nice but by the 3rd night, the sheets were pulled up and way too loose for me to not be annoyed. I probably won't be buying this again unless it came in the full size specifically, but for the price it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not awesome
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be a good sheet set and similar quality to the inexpensive bedding at ikea which is excellent but this is not. The sheets themselves are extremely thin and do not seem durable at all. I am disappointed with this purchase and will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Great colors, comfortable, low price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, great buy, super stylish. My younger sibling is very picky with the colors they want in their room, and finally I found something that doesn’t irritate him. Amazon has such great items for their reasonable price. Be sure to wash it first to get any stale packing smells out and to fluff it up. We didn’t wash it at first because we didn’t mind, but it was even more comfy when we did wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Juno Carmella

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the Buck.
customer_reviews.text: The sheets are thin and not terribly soft but the weave is tight and they have plenty of room even if you have a deeper mattress (ours are 10.5"). The comforter is a bit on the thin side, also, but is perfect for a room that doesn't get too terribly cold. Not the greatest quality but it's where it should be for the price point which is unbeatable.
customer_reviews.author: Tanja M. Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: Great Sheet Set
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a women's retreat I attend every year. The beds are singles and you bring your own linens. Since I knew I would be returning again and again, I thought "Why not buy a bedding set?" This one is great. It launders well, the aqua color is beautiful, and the sheets are so silky soft. Also, if you fight with it enough, you can get it back in the original bag which is helpful for my situation. Would be great for a dorm room or student room with a twin bed.
customer_reviews.author: L. Beach

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cute colors, lifted my mood when I walked in the room
customer_reviews.text: Comfortabl, so happy with the buy. Amazon has such great items for their price! Wash it first to get any stale packing smells out and to fluff it up. We didn’t wash it at first because we didn’t mind, but it was even more comfy when we did wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Juno Carmella

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkled comforters, bright yellow
customer_reviews.text: The comforters have remained wrinkled despite multiple washes. The yellow is more of a lemon/mustard yellow, than the buttery in the picture. Bought for unexpected guests, so quick shipping and price were nice, but definitely shopping for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and soft
customer_reviews.text: I am sooo glad I ordered this 5 Piece Bed-in-a-Bag twin product. I read several of the ratings online from other buyers, which described the vibrant color and softness of the comforter and the sheets. I was not disappointed! The color is beautiful, and just the right weight for me. The sheets are so soft, and wash and dry beautifully and don't fade.
customer_reviews.author: Penelope's Place

customer_reviews.title: So soft.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because of the price, the boho western feel. As soon as I unrolled it from the package, I was surprised there was no wrinkles, I proceeded to wash it and then dry- still no wrinkles! I put it on our bed- and they are so soft. The sheets & comforter is an amazing deal! The sheets do move around a little more, beings as they're microfiber. The comforter, says light weight but it's still a little heavier than I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeh Simon

customer_reviews.title: Omg... ORDER.THIS.NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for our guest bedroom so that my in-laws would have some nice new bedding while they stayed with us for a week. I wasn’t expecting the world for a seven-piece set under $50, but I was VERY pleasantly surprised! These sheets are siiiilllllkkkkyyyy smooth and the comforter is just right! It’s not too heavy, not too light. The print is beautiful. I am amazed that this is so great at such a low price!
customer_reviews.author: Obsessive Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sleep Haven!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I took a chance and bought this bedding. According to all the reviews customers seemed pleased with them. Let me tell you that these are the softest bedding set I have ever purchased. Really comfy. I’ve had them for over a month and have washed them. They come out nice from wash and not too wrinkled at all. My daughter has a twin set also in a different color and she loves them. Last night I purchased another set for her bed and for mine!!!! Love them!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Sostre

customer_reviews.title: Great spare room bed set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great all in one set for the spare bed in your house. I bought this for my spare room and inflatable mattress. Sheets are thin but look good with the air mattress I needed to but on a padded mattress cover and a wool blanket due to it being winter. But if you had a standard mattress that might not be as necessary. The stitching on the comforter is not the best but for the minimal use that this receives I'm sure it will hold up for a good amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jason R Walter

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality bedding
customer_reviews.text: This was a very good bedding for me. I am a college student who has tried multiple bedding's but none of which were as good as this one. First off the color scheme was very nice, the dark blue and silver compliment each other well. The material is strong and hasn't been stained from sweat like others have. I recommend this to any college students who live in the dorms, it will be well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets warm
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the design of the comforter, very light colored with white sheets. I might not have read the product details properly but it does come with white sheets rather than teal sheets which I was expecting. We set a/c at 73-74 it gets warm pretty quickly when you are under it and we start sweating in the middle of our sleep. We have got used to lowering the temperature at the middle of the night. Apart from this I like it and would recommend it to buyers.
customer_reviews.author: av

customer_reviews.title: They dont stay on
customer_reviews.text: The teal sheets are more green than blue, so theyre more like a turquoise. The fittef sheet doesnt stay on the bed. I've never had sheets pop off the corners as often as these. The sheets are soft and light weight, but theyre also very warm so if youre a hot sleeper then these arent for you. I wont be returning these bc the pillowcases and comforter are fine, but ill have the find new teal sheets that stay on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: lacey lewing

customer_reviews.title: Nice material. Beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: I would buy this again. Nice material. Beautiful color. Comfortable. Affordable. Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: Love this sheet set! super comfortable sheet set that comes with everything you need for a twin bed. I work once a week at the fire department and this sheet set is exactly what I was looking for. Comes with the fitted sheet, bed sheet, comforter, and 2 pillowcases. The only issue I had was with the plastic bag that the set came with, it was not very durable and ripped after trying to get the set back into it the first time. Other than that this set has been awesome and I would recommend to anyone that is looking for a comfortable set of sheets. Firefighter approved!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High Price for Cheap Product
customer_reviews.text: Normally I adore AmazonBasics products. They are usually just as good, if not better, than name brand products. This has been the exception for me. The microfiber is incredibly thin and snags very easily. I have had plenty of microfiber bedding items and like them. This kind feels very cheap and will not last very long at all. It's not worth the price for this bedding set. I have purchased a $20 bedding set on Amazon before and it was even better quality.
customer_reviews.author: maribeth

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: To say I was skeptical is an understatement. I've priced many bed spreads and bed in a bag sets, this one happens to have been the best price and was the most appealing. It was delivered on time, the sheets are soft, fits full size bed perfectly with a little room to spare so the comforter doesn't look weird. Best part was how my sons face lite up when he saw it. Absolutely loved it and the colors. He's wanting to decorate his new room as a combination of star wars and Batman so these colors happen to go with it prefect.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Overall an okay product, definitely does the job of keeping me comfy and ties the room altogether. I will say that it does feel cheaply made. I mean you definitely are getting what you paid for & I don’t mind it that much personally, but just keep that in mind when you are purchasing this product. Also, I’m not a huge fan of the pillow cases, I find that my pillows always slip out of them since they don’t have that flap at the end.
customer_reviews.author: Saki

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a boy. Comforter is a tad bit thin, so I bought my son an extra throw blanket. My son approved.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Clements

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting much from this set. I really just liked how it looked and needed a new one. When I first started pulling the sheets and pillows out of the bag I was surprised how good the quality of everything is. I will definitely be buying other patterns, hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: Musmom

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: So much prettier in person! Fits my guest bed perfect, the colors are vibrant, the sheets and comforter are soft, and it was just the right touch to complete the guest room. In fact, my fiance likes it enough he is now calling the guest room the "dog house" and is trying to find a way to get put in the dog house so he can sleep on the bed. :)
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Very soft & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sheets and comforter were softer than I thought they’d be. We bought this for our son who just upgraded to a bigger bed. He loves the set! The comforter isn’t too heavy. It is the right weight. The sheets are good quality and everything held up well after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Wendeelou

customer_reviews.title: this is the best way I could go
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is the best way I could go! These items look good and function as described. The fabric feels a little synthetic, but because it was cheap, I really don't mind.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Gates

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this comforter set for my daughter’s room and she absolutely loves it. The color “aqua” is spot on, a nice aqua-blue shade. The design is a nice subtle touch too! She has a Full size bed so I ordered the “full/queen” set.
customer_reviews.author: A.K

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: If you want the softest, most amazing bedding that feels like butter on your skin, you'll have to spend a lot more. If you just want some decent quality (not easily ripping, no loose threads, no weird discoloration) sheets so you aren't sleeping on a bare mattress, these will do! I did have trouble getting the fitted sheet to cover my 15" mattress but they're otherwise fine. Be sure to follow the washing instructions so they don't shrink and the comforter doesn't get lumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... with some of the reviews but it was a SUPER purchase for the price and quality
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about this with some of the reviews but it was a SUPER purchase for the price and quality!!! I AM BEYOND happy with it. I was worried it would be as thin as a quilt but it is nice and fluffy like a normal comforter. The material is not cheap or scratchy and looks like it will hold up well! This is for my 8 year boy and I did not want him to be cold- I was going to layer it with a down blanket but will now just use a light weight fleece blanket. GREAT product amazon!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Doria

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT! Cat friendly
customer_reviews.text: When I put this on my bed, the first thing my cat did was jump on it and start making biscuits. I was worried she'd immediately put little thread pricks in the new fabric but the blanket held up fine. I haven't run it through the washing machine yet so I'm not sure how it will hold up, but it is incredibly soft and cozy. It's got a decent weight to it without being too hot. I think yellow on the reverse of the pattern I chose is a little weird but that's fine. (If anyone is wondering, I got the throw pillow at Target).
customer_reviews.author: Skaters Feet

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I might order another just to have another set. It is beautiful and the sheets and everything washed nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I love the bright aqua color and geometric designs
customer_reviews.text: Lovely set for the price. I love the bright aqua color and geometric designs. Not the highest quality but good.
customer_reviews.author: RaiderRush

customer_reviews.title: Looks just like the picture!
customer_reviews.text: I picked the yellow/grey/white set and absolutely it. It looks just like the picture and looks AMAZING in the room. It was extremely wrinkled (just a heads up), but is gorgeous. The fitted sheet fit over a pillowtop queen with room to spare and the pillow cases give you options to match to your taste if you don't want 4 pillows (2 white, 1 yellow, and 1 striped white/grey).
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Testa

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets, love the color and feel.
customer_reviews.text: I love this comforter set. Exactly what I needed and looked for. The colors are perfect and I love the fact that it’s reversible so I’m able to switch up the look on occasion. The sheets fit just right on my queen sized bed. I bought the sheets for our guest room and they brighten the room so well. For less than $35 I was able to get a complete bed sheet set. I think this was worth the money, especially for a guest room/mainly unoccupied room in your house!
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Bold and beautiful colors! Soft sheets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed something quick and had no time to go shopping. I loved the colors and figured why not give it a shot. The colors are vibrant and just beautiful. The sheets are slightly thin but they are soft. They also are deep so they fit the mattress perfect which I was worried about. They do not pull off while Sleeping at all. This was a great purchase. I used it in my guest room and I plan to look at the other sets to buy a couple more to have variety.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty amazing and soft
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty amazing and soft! I change my bed clothing weekly and what a surprise it was buying these on prime deal of the day! They are super cute, fit well, warm enough and soft! I am seriously considering getting a second set!
customer_reviews.author: L. M.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this set is terrible. The sheets are paper thin and feel terrible on your skin. I bought this to use as a bed-in-a-bag set for an air mattress for guests. I will not use it for anything. Already washed it and not sure I can return otherwise I would do so immediately. Don't waste your money. Put a few more dollars towards a quality set.
customer_reviews.author: dmacgallant

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect
customer_reviews.text: Amazon basics is going to take over the world. I was searching and searching for a nice comforter set that was inexpensive, my dog once in a blue moon enjoys tearing open my comforters and removing all the stuffing so I don’t want to spend $200 on a comforter set. This was perfect. It’s sheets and pillow cases are soft, the comforter is light weight but keeps you warm, easy to clean. Will buy amazon basics again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Kay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dorm life
customer_reviews.text: My son is going away for a three week camp at a college. I needed to buy xl twin sheets but I didn't want to spend a ton of money. These were perfect. The sheets are soft and lightweight but the comforter seems like it would be warm if the dorm is chilly. The colors are great and vibrant. My son really likes it. I will add to my review after his camp and see how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Net Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are absolutely gorgeous and the comforter is so soft. The sheets are soft and silky. I love the pattern and everything about this bedding set! The colors of the sheets are beautiful. It’s lightweight but feels like it will be warm enough as well. I think it’s more of an orangey coral than a pink coral, but that is fine with me. I wanted a peachy colored bed set and it’s close enough and I think it’s gorgeous. My bed is a full and this set is supposed to fit a full/queen. So it’s a little bit big for my bed, but some strategic tucks and it fits just fine. My cats both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for guest bedroom!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this bed in a bag set and the price is very reasonable. I bought two twin/full sets for my guest bedroom. The quality and material feel nice and soft. I am giving 4 stars because the only flaw was that there were little spot stains after the first wash on one of the sheets. They are small specks that look like oil stains. But for the price, it is still worth it. Would recommend for guest bedroom in any home. Pattern is very nice and modern too!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Really good product (Good quality, easy to wash)
customer_reviews.text: This product comes exactly as advertised on the site. It comes as a 7-piece set containing a flat sheet, fitted sheet, a comforter, 2 pillow covers, and 2 shams. I ordered the metallic grey one. In the ad, it appears as more on the brownish side. However it metallic grey. The design and quality are really good. It is easy to wash and dry. It fits my queen size mattress perfectly. The packaging was pretty good. The entire set comes packaged in a plastic case with a zipper. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Akash Udani

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this set but unfortunately it has already gotten what looks like stretch Mark's on it. That is not acceptable I wash edit once by itself and air dried it just to be safe and I still have one spot missing color. If you just need a cheap set this is comfortable cheap and comes with everything but I'd have to say the color printing leaves much to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: It Again

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and soft
customer_reviews.text: This bed set was a great buy. The price was fair, it's very soft, the comforter is lightweight but comfortable and very warm. The pillow cases are just as soft. I wasn't sure of I would really like the design on the comforter but I do. I always wash my sheets/bed sets before use and after washing and drying, everything still looks the same, no lose stitches or anything. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my son's dorm and it lasted ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's dorm and it lasted all school year without any issues. This will be used again next school year
customer_reviews.author: Raven R

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this set a while back and it’s still in great shape. I previously purchased this bed set for my son (9) in the twin size. The color is great and hasn’t faded at all with washing. The comforter is not to hot not to cold. Blankets are soft but not fuzzy soft just like smooth kinda feeling. He likes them and the beautiful blue color goes great in his gray room. I would recommend to someone who does like blankets but doesn’t like hot blankets. I would purchase again. Satisfied with product.
customer_reviews.author: ang

customer_reviews.title: Beauty, Comfort and Value !!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best values I've found on Amazon. Check out the price of this comforter set that also includes a complete sheet set !!! Its soft and comfortable and looks beautiful on the bed. Oh yeah, don't forget the price !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo W.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Comforter!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this set! I've tried a couple of other comforters, but this one is absolutely wonderful. It doesn't bunch up, and is just right in terms of being breathable. It looks great, feels even better. It's super soft, and keeps me nice and warm without getting scratchy or too warm at night. The look of this set is awesome as well, it enhances my room's decor. I only wish there would have been an option to pick to buy it without the sheet set, or a sheet set with a different color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft!!
customer_reviews.text: The pattern looks a little uglier in person from far away, but I think when you’re in the bed, it is still very cute. Purple is my favorite color which helps a lot too. The sheets are a synthetic material that feels very soft and I appreciate how there are many pillow cases so I can change it often. Comforter is extremely soft! Easy to wash and dry as well. The comforter isn’t extremely warm so you would have to layer in the winter but for spring/fall it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hilal Kesim

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding comforter set for college student
customer_reviews.text: My daughter chose the Aqua set and when it arrived we were 'wowed'. It is a beautiful color on both sides, it's soft and fluffy. After examining it for defects, I threw it in the washer and dryer and it came out beautifully. I couldn't be more pleased. The same with the sheets, they are so soft, i wish they fit my bed at home. The pillow sham was the only thing that I wouldn't give a 5. It's kind of flimsy and a bit small but overall the set gets a 5 Star review!
customer_reviews.author: L. O.

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent dorm set. It's quite a bit less expensive than the set that I bought for my older son from the college and I think that this set looks a little nicer as well. The nice thing about buying it on Amazon is the fact that you don't get stuck paying for extra items that will never be used. Anyway, it's very soft and comfortable as well as affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Navy Simple Plaid is Nave/Grey - not Navy/White
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of this set, but a little disappointed as I thought the Navy Simple Plaid was navy and white based on the photo - it's not. It's navy and a light grey color; the sheets are also light grey. Other than that, this is a great little set. I've already washed the sheets that came with it. I'm very impressed by how soft and sateen-like they are. The sheets held up great to their first wash/dry. I have not washed the comforter just yet. Overall - really happy with the quality of set just wished the simple navy had white sheets and white stripes instead of grey.
customer_reviews.author: Brett E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set for an Even Better Price
customer_reviews.text: I am SO impressed with this set. Super soft and fits our Queen bed perfectly. You can't beat the price. The color is gorgeous; a lovely and bright turquoise that has inspired a 2020 bedroom overhaul. (Hubster is so excited. Ha.) Will for sure purchase another set or two for the variety. A really great product for an unbeatable price.
customer_reviews.author: Deezy

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my daughters bed, but the pillowcases have ended up shared around house. The comforter is soft, and a great weight, it's beautiful and the colors are vibrant. In fact the whole set is just the perfect shade of purple. Everything has been through multiple washes and are still lovely. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: The Ridleys

customer_reviews.title: Low quality/rips apart.
customer_reviews.text: Looked nice initially but the fabric quality isn't that great and the seams come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brown

customer_reviews.title: Run!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Don't buy these! I purchased in a hurry because my roommate had fried my good things while I was away. This is junk. I would be embarrassed if somebody came to stay and this see through crap was on the bed. It's like hefty bags with patterns printed on it except more flimsy. Run away!!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this blanket set over the holidays for our guest bedroom, I needed something fast to accommodate our constant guests. I looked all around for comforter sets but everything was SO EXPENSIVE, and not such good quality. I came upon this not expecting much from the low price . I have to say I am completely blown away by the amazing quality. The blanket is soft, and easily packs heat. I will definitely be ordering more of these perfectly insulated blankets for my bedroom. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for comfort and low prices.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelydove44

customer_reviews.title: Great for dorm room!
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect purschase for my son to have for his dorm room. The quality is great. Very soft and the pattern is great for a young man.
customer_reviews.author: Joesma

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: If you are anything like me, I am back and forth with products and reading reviews. I was very impressed with this purchase. The color is beautiful and vibrant. I get many compliments on how pretty the set is and it really brings out the room, I purchased the Teal Trellis color and accented with white shears for the window and accent pillows to the bed. Sheets are a little thin, but after washing before use the are extremely soft and silky. The fitted sheet fit the bed snuggly and no sliding or slipping of the top sheet. Very Impressed with this purchase! If you had to choose, I would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: shebreaka

customer_reviews.title: Great look & value!!
customer_reviews.text: This comforter set was a great value. The fabric is lightweight and soft. The colors and patterns are vibrant. looks just like what is advertised. It is a F/Q size so the fitted sheet is kind of too big if you have a full size mattress like I do. Even with that said, I am very please with this purchase and will purchase another comforter set soon.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: It's lovely and fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great deal. We bought this for a full bed in my MIL's guest bedroom. It really took the bed up a notch and it hangs beautifully. The sheets were nice and soft. If you are looking for something inexpensive but nice quality, I would recommend. As bonus it arrived earlier than was originally scheduled!
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, soft, perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a set for our spare bed and Amazon basic has not let us down in the past. Well they exceeded my expectations this time. This set is beautiful. It's soft and the fitted sheet actually covers the matress and box spring. So no need for a bed skirt. The comforter is more of a spring/summer comforter but is perfect for guests. If your someone who freezes at night then I recommend adding an extra blanket to the mix but if not then this set is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: ~*Ashley*~

customer_reviews.title: A premium bed set at an economy price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fantastic sheet set. I have found it to not trap your body heat at all so you're able to be cool and sleep comfortably through the night. Also some sheets tend to stain and although this sheet set is white I have not observed any stains at all even with using hair products and face creams. Very pleased about that. The comforter has a beautiful design and is very soft and warm. after washing I have seen no fading and no issues with the threads. Also I have not observed any lint which typically happens with cheaper sheet sets. I am very happy and intend to purchase again so please keep this product around.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a full bed! It’s sold as Full/Queen but it would definitely be too small for a queen. I even wish it was slightly bigger on my full bed so it would hang lower to cover the box spring completely (since it does not come with a bed skirt) otherwise it’s just as pictured! This blue/gray color is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: CJC124

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics 5-Piece Light-Weight Microfiber Bed-In-A-Bag Comforter Bedding Set - Twin or Twin XL, Navy Simple Plaid
product_meta.description: Color:Navy Simple Plaid| Size:Twin/Twin XL| Style:1-PackAmazonBasics brings you everyday items at a great value. An Amazon Brand.
feature_bullets: Includes 66 x 90 inch comforter, 66 x 96 inch flat sheet, 39 x 80 inch fitted sheet, 20 x 26 inch sham, and 20 x 30 inch pillowcase
All pieces of set conveniently complement each other to produce a complete and stylish bedding design
Fabric is made of 100% polyester microfiber for a soft and gentle texture
Comforter filling is 100% polyester for cozy warmth
Made in OEKO-TEX Standard 100 factory, an independent certification system that ensures textiles meet high safety and environmental standards.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars14,872 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
